title: AI-Powered Threat Detection System
description: Machine learning-based intrusion detection system that analyzes network traffic patterns to identify potential security threats in real-time using deep learning algorithms.

title: Automated Vulnerability Scanner
description: Custom vulnerability assessment tool that performs comprehensive security audits on web applications, identifying OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities and generating detailed reports.

title: Secure Cloud Infrastructure
description: Enterprise-grade cloud security architecture implementing zero-trust principles, automated compliance monitoring, and incident response workflows across AWS infrastructure.

title: Red Team Automation Framework
description: Comprehensive penetration testing framework automating reconnaissance, exploitation, and post-exploitation phases with custom payloads and evasion techniques.

title: Security Operations Dashboard
description: Real-time security monitoring dashboard aggregating data from multiple sources including SIEM, IDS/IPS, and threat intelligence feeds with automated alerting.

title: Blockchain Security Auditor
description: Smart contract security analysis tool that identifies vulnerabilities in Solidity code, performs static and dynamic analysis, and generates comprehensive audit reports.
